articles.title: Trump Suggests Osama bin Laden Wasn't a 'Monster': He Only Had 'One Hit' - The Daily Beast
articles.description: The former president minimized the now-deceased terrorist just a couple weeks before the 20th anniversary of 9/11 and the same day a dozen Americans were killed in Kabul.

articles.title: COVID Vaccine Protection Against Severe Disease - MedicineNet
